briefdescription.para: Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: the tag for the bank header.
the data type for the content of the bank.
sometimes, but not necessarily, an ordinal enumeration.

briefdescription.para: Get the length of the structure's data in 32 bit ints (not counting the header words).

simplesect.para: Get the length of the structure's data in 32 bit ints (not counting the header words).

briefdescription.para: Get the length of the structure's header in ints.

detaileddescription.para:
This includes the first header word itself (which contains the length) and in the case of banks, it also includes the second header word.
Get the length of the structure's header in ints.

briefdescription.para: Obtain a string representation of the bank header.

simplesect.para: a string representation of the bank header.

briefdescription.para: Write myself out a byte buffer.

detaileddescription.para: This write is relative - i.e., it uses the current position of the buffer.

simplesect.para: the number of bytes written, which for a BankHeader is 8.

briefdescription.para: Write myself out a byte buffer.

detaileddescription.para: This write is relative - i.e., it uses the current position of the buffer.

simplesect.para: the number of bytes written, which for a BankHeader is 8.

briefdescription.para: Write myself out as evio format data into the given byte array in the specified byte order.

parameterdescription.para: array into which evio data is written (destination).
byte order in which to write the data.

simplesect.para: the number of bytes written, which for a BankHeader is 8.

parameterdescription.para: if destination array too small to hold data.

briefdescription.para: Get the number.

detaileddescription.para:
Only Banks have a number field in their header, so this is only relevant for Banks.
the number.

briefdescription.para: Set the number.

detaileddescription.para:
Only Banks have a number field in their header, so this is only relevant for Banks.
num
the number.

briefdescription.para: Get the data type for the structure.

simplesect.para: the data type for the structure.

briefdescription.para: Set the numeric data type for the structure.

parameterdescription.para: the numeric data type for the structure.

briefdescription.para: Set the numeric data type for the structure.

parameterdescription.para: the numeric data type for the structure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the data type for data stored in this structure as a DataType enum.

simplesect.para: the data type for data stored in this structure as a DataType enum.

briefdescription.para: Returns the data type as a string.

simplesect.para: the data type as a string.

briefdescription.para: Get the amount of padding bytes when storing short or byte data.

detaileddescription.para:
Value is 0, 1, 2, or 3 for bytes and 0 or 2 for shorts.
number of padding bytes

briefdescription.para: Get the length of the structure in 32 bit ints, not counting the length word.

simplesect.para: Get the length of the structure in 32 bit ints (not counting the length word).

briefdescription.para: Set the length of the structure in 32 bit ints, not counting the length word.

parameterdescription.para: the length of the structure in 32 bit ints, not counting the length word.

briefdescription.para: Get the structure tag.
Set the structure tag.
The length of the structure in 32-bit words.

detaileddescription.para: This never includes the first header word itself (which contains the length).

briefdescription.para: The structure tag.
The data type of the structure.
The amount of padding bytes when storing short or byte data.

detaileddescription.para: Allowed value is 0, 1, 2, or 3 (0,2 for shorts and 0-3 for bytes) and is stored in the upper 2 bits of the dataType when written out.

briefdescription.para: The number represents an unsigned byte.

detaileddescription.para: Only Banks have a number field in their header, so this is only relevant for Banks.

briefdescription.para: Set the amount of padding bytes when storing short or byte data.

detaileddescription.para:
Allowed value is 0, 1, 2, or 3 for bytes and 0 or 2 for shorts.
pad
amount of padding bytes when storing short or byte data (0-3).

briefdescription.para: Method to copy data from the fiven header to this one.
This the header for an evio bank structure (EvioBank).

detaileddescription.para: It does not contain the raw data, just the header. Note: since an "event" is really just the outermost bank, this is also the header for an EvioEvent. Copied from the java class of identical name.
